languages.text: {n}Узнав о заступничестве Вольного Торговца, каторжане со слезами вознесли молитвы за {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость. Надзиратели милостиво воздержались от мщения, вздернув лишь заводил мятежа, против чего не протестовали даже сами невольники — а как же еще?{/n}

{n}After learning of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The overseers generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, to which even the convicts themselves had no objection — it was only right, after all.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Узнав о заступничестве Вольного Торговца, каторжане со слезами вознесли молитвы за {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость. Надзиратели милостиво воздержались от мщения, вздернув лишь заводил мятежа, против чего не протестовали даже сами невольники — а как же еще?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Having learned of the intercession from the Rogue Trader, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The wardens have generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, and even the slaves did not protest against it — how else could it be?{/n}

{n}Having learned of the intercession from the Rogue Trader, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The wardens have generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, and even the slaves did not protest against it — how else could it be?{/n}

{n}After learning of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The overseers generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, to which even the convicts themselves had no objection — it was only right, after all.{/n}

{n}Having learned of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The wardens have generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, the slaves not lifting a finger in protest — and how else would they react?{/n}

{n}Having learned of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The overseers have generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, the convicts not lifting a finger in protest — and how else would they react?{/n}

{n}After learning of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The overseers generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, to which even the convicts themselves had no objection — it was only right, after all.{/n}

{n}After learning of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The overseers generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, to which even the convicts themselves had no objection — it was only right, after all.{/n}

{n}After learning of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The overseers generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, to which even the convicts themselves had no objection — it was only right, after all.{/n}

languages.text: {n}得知行商浪人为他们说情后，所有囚犯都喜极而泣，纷纷为{mf|他|她}祈祷。监察员慷慨地放弃了复仇，只绞死了那些挑起骚乱的人，其他囚犯完全没有任何抗议的想法。毕竟，那些人死有余辜。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After learning of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The overseers generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, to which even the convicts themselves had no objection — it was only right, after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}得知行商浪人为他们说情后，所有囚犯都喜极而泣，纷纷为{mf|他|她}祈祷。监察员慷慨地放弃了复仇，只绞死了那些挑起骚乱的人，其他囚犯完全没有任何抗议的想法。毕竟，那些人死有余辜。{/n}
{n}得知行商浪人为他们说情后，所有囚犯都喜极而泣，纷纷为{mf|他|她}祈祷。监察员慷慨地放弃了复仇，只绞死了那些挑起骚乱的人，其他囚犯完全没有一丁点抗议的念头。毕竟他们已经得到了这样的恩惠，还能有什么不满呢？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al descubrir que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente había intercedido en su favor, los convictos lloraron y rezaron por {mf|él|ella}. Los supervisores se abstuvieron de vengarse con toda la generosidad de sus corazones: se limitaron a ahorcar a los que provocaron el motín, cosa a la que ni los propios convictos se opusieron. Era lo justo, después de todo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After learning of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The overseers generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, to which even the convicts themselves had no objection — it was only right, after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al descubrir que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente había intercedido en su favor, los convictos lloraron y rezaron por {mf|él|ella}. Los supervisores se abstuvieron de vengarse con toda la generosidad de sus corazones: se limitaron a ahorcar a los que provocaron el motín, cosa a la que ni los propios convictos se opusieron. Era lo justo, después de todo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}自由開拓者が自分たちのために執り成しをしてくれたことを知った受刑者たちは、泣きながら陛下に祈りを捧げた。看守は寛大にも復讐を控え、暴動を引き起こした者のみを絞首刑に処したため、囚人たちは抗議しようとはしなかった...それ以外にどんな反応があるだろうか？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After learning of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The overseers generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, to which even the convicts themselves had no objection — it was only right, after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ローグトレーダーが自分たちのために執り成しをしてくれたことを知った受刑者たちは、泣きながら陛下に祈りを捧げた。看守は寛大にも復讐を控え、暴動を引き起こした者のみを絞首刑に処したため、奴隷たちは抗議しようとはしなかった...それ以外にどんな反応があるだろうか？{/n}
{n}ローグトレーダーが自分たちのために執り成しをしてくれたことを知った受刑者たちは、泣きながら陛下に祈りを捧げた。看守は寛大にも復讐を控え、暴動を引き起こした者のみを絞首刑に処したため、奴隷たちは抗議しようとはしなかった...それ以外にどんな反応があるだろうか？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Apprenant que {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} a intercédé en leur faveur, les détenus se mettent à pleurer et à prier en son honneur. Les contremaîtres s'abstiennent généreusement de toute vengeance, n'exécutant que les émeutiers. Les détenus n'émettent pas la moindre objection... Comment pourraient-ils faire autrement ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After learning of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The overseers generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, to which even the convicts themselves had no objection — it was only right, after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Apprenant que {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} a intercédé en leur faveur, les détenus se mettent à pleurer et à prier en son honneur. Les contremaîtres s'abstiennent généreusement de toute vengeance, n'exécutant que les émeutiers. Les détenus n'émettent pas la moindre objection... Comment pourraient-ils faire autrement ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als die Sträflinge erfuhren, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sich für sie eingesetzt hatte, weinten sie und priesen {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft}. Die Aufseher verzichteten großzügig auf Vergeltung und hängten lediglich die Urheber des Aufstandes, wogegen selbst die Sträflinge nichts einzuwenden hatten ... schließlich war das nur rechtens.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After learning of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The overseers generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, to which even the convicts themselves had no objection — it was only right, after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als die Sträflinge erfuhren, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sich für sie eingesetzt hatte, weinten sie und priesen {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft}. Die Aufseher verzichteten großzügig auf Vergeltung und hängten lediglich die Urheber des Aufstandes, wogegen selbst die Sträflinge nichts einzuwenden hatten ... schließlich war das nur rechtens.{/n}

{n}Als die Sträflinge erfuhren, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sich für sie eingesetzt hatte, weinten sie und priesen {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft}. Die Wärter sahen großzügig von einer Vergeltung ab und hängten nur die Rädelsführer des Aufstands. Die Sklaven protestierten nicht — was hätten sie auch tun sollen?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hür Tacir'in lehlerine karar verdiğini öğrenen mahkûmlar, gözyaşlarına boğularak {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri için dua etti. Öç haklarından feragat eden gözetmenler de yalnızca tahrikleriyle isyanın çıkmasına yol açanları idam etti. Mahkûmlar, duruma hiç karşı çıkmadı. Sonuçta olması gereken olmuştu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After learning of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The overseers generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, to which even the convicts themselves had no objection — it was only right, after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hür Tacir'in lehlerine karar verdiğini öğrenen mahkûmlar, gözyaşlarına boğularak {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri için dua etti. Öç haklarından feragat eden gözetmenler de yalnızca tahrikleriyle isyanın çıkmasına yol açanları idam etti. Mahkûmlar, duruma hiç karşı çıkmadı. Sonuçta olması gereken olmuştu.{/n}
